mapper.update: update sys_user_group set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parent_name = #{parentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, code, parent_id, parent_name, description from sys_user_group
